_header: I-blessed be God over all thing
Subjects: God, mercy of; mercy, songs of; scripture, Engl. trans. of
_description: Rejoice in God’s Mercy — two couplets translating the portion of the psalm ‘Benedictus deus qui non amouit orationem meam’, which precedes it

CULIi38.Transcription:
yblessed be god ofer alle þyngÞat haht y herud my
                    prayingAnd to is mercy me haueȝt y takeWel oute ic þanne
                    ioye make
